full_text:
Here is the extracted text content from the fact-check article:

Claim:
Hot pineapple water can cure cancer

A viral message is spreading on WhatsApp, Facebook groups claiming that drinking hot water with pineapple pieces can help fight cancer. According to the claim, adding some pineapple pieces to hot water will provide the body with the ability to fight against the disease.

The claim mentions a supposed quote from a "Professor Dr. Gilbert A" from ICBS General Hospital stating that "When pineapple is heated, it releases anti-cancer substances. This is a recent advancement in cancer treatment."

The viral message further claims that hot pineapple water can:
- Kill cancer cell tumors and masses
- Eliminate all types of cancer
- Remove microorganisms and bacteria from the body
- Destroy "aggressive cells" without affecting healthy cells
- Regulate high blood pressure
- Prevent internal blood vessel blockages

Fact Check/Verification:
After thorough investigation, NewsChecker found this claim to be false. Key findings include:

1. No credible evidence was found of a "Dr. Gilbert A" from ICBS General Hospital. The name appears to be fabricated.

2. Scientific research shows limited potential:
- Some laboratory studies indicate bromelain (an enzyme in pineapples) may inhibit cancer cell growth
- However, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center notes there is insufficient human clinical evidence to claim pineapple cures cancer

3. Expert opinions:
- Dr. Jojo V Joseph (Senior Oncology Surgeon) stated: "Pineapple is a good dietary addition, but it cannot magically cure cancer"
- Experts emphasize that while fruits can support overall health, they are not cancer treatments

Conclusion:
The claim that hot pineapple water can cure cancer is false. While pineapple contains compounds that show some potential in laboratory studies, there is no scientific evidence supporting its use as a cancer treatment.

Result: False
title: ಬಿಸಿ ಅನಾನಸು ನೀರನ್ನು ಕ್ಯಾನ್ಸರ್‌ಗೆ ಚಿಕಿತ್ಸೆಯಾಗಿ ಬಳಸಬಹುದು ಎನ್ನುವುದು ತಪ್ಪುದಾರಿಗೆಳೆಯುವ ಹೇಳಿಕೆ ಎಂದು ನ್ಯೂಸ್‌ಚೆಕರ್‌ ತನ್ನ ಸಂಶೋಧನೆಯ ಮೂಲಕ ಬಹಿರಂಗಪಡಿಸಿದೆ. ಅನನಾಸಿನಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಕಿಣ್ವಗಳು ಕ್ಯಾನ್ಸರ್‌ ಜೀವಕೋಶದ ಬೆಳವಣಿಗೆಯನ್ನು ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಿಸಿ ಅವುಗಳು ನಾಶಹೊಂದುತ್ತವೆ ಎನ್ನುವುದು ಪ್ರಯೋಗಾಲಯದಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆಸಿದ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಕಂಡುಬಂದಿದೆ. ಆದರೆ, ಇದು ಕ್ಯಾನ್ಸರ್‌ ರೋಗವನ್ನು ಗುಣಪಡಿಸುವಲ್ಲಿ ಬಳಕೆಯಾಗುತ್ತದೆ ಎಂಬ ಖಾತರಿ ಇಲ್ಲವಾಗಿದೆ.
